person.persName: Littleton Richardson (Metcalfe County, Kentucky, school teacher and partisan ranger (C.S.A.))

body.p: Metcalfe County, Kentucky, school teacher and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Fielding J. Richardson and Catherine Richardson. Resident in Barren County, Kentucky in 1850. School teacher in Metcalfe County, Kentucky in 1860. Served as a partisan ranger (C.S.A.). Captured by the Thirty-Seventh Kentucky Mounted Infantry on March 5, 1864, and he was killed while trying to escape.
